Google Cloud Messaging for Chrome API Terms of Service

The chrome.pushMessaging API was deleted in Chrome 43. This document exists for posterity only. Use the new Google Cloud Messaging.

Last modified: March 31, 2013

By using the Google Cloud Messaging for Chrome API, you consent to be bound by the Google APIs Terms of Service ("API ToS") at http://developers.google.com/terms.

Section 1: API Clients

You also agree that you and any API Client you create may only access the getChannelId functionality of this API for your own development and personal uses.
